events.message: We have received an application from a highly skilled software engineer with five years of experience in full-stack development.
The candidate's application has been categorized under Engineering based on keywords like software engineer and development experience.
Recruiter Jessica has been assigned to the candidate to manage communications and coordinate the hiring process.
The initial phone screening was completed successfully; the candidate demonstrated strong knowledge in software architecture and agile methodologies.
The candidate responded promptly and expressed enthusiasm about moving forward with the technical interview stage.
A technical interview has been scheduled with the engineering team for the candidate next week to assess coding skills and problem-solving ability.
